classified_components.reasoning: Gearbox housing is a structural component that facilitates power transmission in both ICE and EV vehicles.
Gear trains are required in both internal combustion engine (ICE) and electric vehicles (EV) to convert rotational motion from the power source to the wheels.
Clutch assembly is used in both manual transmission ICE vehicles and some hybrid EVs for managing power transfer during gear changes.
The differential is a mechanical component used in both internal combustion engine (ICE) and electric vehicles (EV) to distribute engine torque or motor torque to the wheels.
